pageContext.claim: “We essentially repealed Obamacare because we got rid of the individual mandate ... and that was a primary source of funding of Obamacare.”
pageContext.analysis: This is false on several levels. The individual mandate penalty provides little funding for the Affordable Care Act -- only about $3 billion out of an annual cost of $120 billion. Moreover, while the individual mandate was an important incentive for Americans to seek health insurance, it was only one part of a far-reaching law that remains intact. The repeal does not take effect until 2019.
